about_the_game:
Embrace the Darkness. Seek Vengeance. Summon the Goddess.

Defend your dark fortress from relentless waves of villagers as you draw arcane runes to summon Ilur, the death goddess who brought you back to life in Runeomicon, a uniquely dark tower defense game. Harness your arcane power to unleash eldritch horrors and fortify your defenses to keep the ritual alive. Use your power wisely—every decision could lead to victory or ruin, as the villagers will stop at nothing to end the ritual.

GAIN POWER

Channel arcane energy by drawing intricate runes. Begin your journey by summoning minor gods as you master your growing power. Use this energy to unleash devastating spells, strengthen your defenses against the relentless siege, or enhance the complexity of your runes. The more intricate the runes, the stronger your magic becomes—but be warned, stronger runes mean greater risk.

THE VILLAGERS WILL NOT STOP

Face wave after wave of increasingly dangerous enemies, from common villagers to heavily armed knights. Their fury grows as your magic intensifies, and if they breach your defenses, your dark ambitions will end in ruin. You must be prepared to counter their every move, deploying lethal defenses that can turn the tide, or your ritual will be forever undone.

BALANCE POWER AND DEFENSE

Choose between increasing your power or reinforcing your defenses. Will you sacrifice power for stronger runes, or invest in fortified towers, spells, gargoyle guardians, eldritch creatures and more devastating defenses to repel the onslaught? To survive, you must decide when to seize power and when to defend your stronghold. Every choice shapes your chances of succeeding.

PROGRESS THROUGH DARK RITUALS

Increase your power as you progress from village to village, summoning each minor god until you are ready to call forth Ilur herself, the goddess of death. But be warned—the stronger your magic, the more formidable your foes become. Only if you master both offense and defense will you achieve your ultimate vengeance.

Defy death. Embrace the darkness. The ritual must continue—no matter the cost.

Balance your power between summoning and fortifying as waves of enemies close in. Can you complete the ritual before your defenses crumble?
